00028 #define           MINIMAP_X_SIZE                88
00029 #define           MINIMAP_Y_SIZE                44
00030 
00031 #define           WINDOW_SIZE                         2
00032 
00033 FLOAT             gdXStep, gdYStep;
00034 INT32             giMiniMap, gi8BitMiniMap;

00042 // Utililty file for sub-sampling/creating our radar screen maps
00043 // Loops though our maps directory and reads all .map files, subsamples an area, color
00044 // quantizes it into an 8-bit image ans writes it to an sti file in radarmaps.
00045 
00046 
00047 typedef struct
00048 {
00049       INT8  r;
00050       INT8  g;
00051       INT8  b;
00052 
00053 } RGBValues;
00054 
00055 UINT32      MapUtilScreenInit( )
00056 {
00057       return( TRUE );
00058 }
00059 
00060 UINT32      MapUtilScreenHandle( )
00061 {
00062       static INT16            fNewMap = TRUE;
00063       static INT16            sFileNum = 0;
00064   InputAtom  InputEvent;
00065       GETFILESTRUCT FileInfo;
00066       static FDLG_LIST *FListNode;
00067       static INT16 sFiles = 0, sCurFile = 0;
00068       static FDLG_LIST *FileList = NULL;
00069       INT8        zFilename[ 260 ], zFilename2[ 260 ];
00070       VSURFACE_DESC           vs_desc;
00071       UINT16                              usWidth;
00072       UINT16                              usHeight;
00073       UINT8                               ubBitDepth;
00074       UINT32                              uiDestPitchBYTES, uiSrcPitchBYTES;
00075       UINT16                                    *pDestBuf, *pSrcBuf;
00076       UINT8                               *pDataPtr;
00077 
00078       static      UINT8                               *p24BitDest = NULL;
00079       static      RGBValues                     *p24BitValues=NULL;
00080 
00081       UINT32                              uiRGBColor;
00082 
00083       UINT32                              bR, bG, bB, bAvR, bAvG, bAvB;
00084       INT16                               s16BPPSrc, sDest16BPPColor;
00085       INT32                               cnt;
00086 
00087       INT16 sX1, sX2, sY1, sY2, sTop, sBottom, sLeft, sRight;
00088       
00089 
00090       FLOAT       dX, dY, dStartX, dStartY;
00091       INT32       iX, iY, iSubX1, iSubY1, iSubX2, iSubY2, iWindowX, iWindowY, iCount;
00092       SGPPaletteEntry pPalette[ 256 ];
00093 
00094 
00095       sDest16BPPColor = -1;
00096       bAvR = bAvG = bAvB = 0;
00097 
00098       // Zero out area!
00099       ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, 0, 0, (INT16)(SCREEN_WIDTH), (INT16)(SCREEN_HEIGHT), Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 0, 0, 0 ) ) );
00100 
00101 
00102       if ( fNewMap )
00103       {
00104             fNewMap = FALSE;
00105       
00106             // Create render buffer
00107             GetCurrentVideoSettings( &usWidth, &usHeight, &ubBitDepth );
00108             vs_desc.fCreateFlags = VSURFACE_CREATE_DEFAULT | VSURFACE_SYSTEM_MEM_USAGE;
00109             vs_desc.usWidth = 88;
00110             vs_desc.usHeight = 44;
00111             vs_desc.ubBitDepth = ubBitDepth;
00112 
00113             if ( AddVideoSurface( &vs_desc, (UINT32 *)&giMiniMap ) == FALSE )
00114             {
00115                   return( ERROR_SCREEN );
00116             }
00117 
00118             // USING BRET's STUFF FOR LOOPING FILES/CREATING LIST, hence AddToFDlgList.....
00119             if( GetFileFirst("MAPS\\*.dat", &FileInfo) )
00120             {
00121                   FileList = AddToFDlgList( FileList, &FileInfo );
00122                   sFiles++;
00123                   while( GetFileNext(&FileInfo) )
00124                   {
00125                         FileList = AddToFDlgList( FileList, &FileInfo );
00126                         sFiles++;
00127                   }
00128                   GetFileClose(&FileInfo);
00129             }
00130 
00131             FListNode = FileList;
00132 
00133             //Allocate 24 bit Surface
00134             p24BitValues = (RGBValues *) MemAlloc( MINIMAP_X_SIZE * MINIMAP_Y_SIZE * sizeof( RGBValues ) );
00135             p24BitDest   = (UINT8*)p24BitValues;
00136 
00137 
00138             //Allocate 8-bit surface
00139             vs_desc.fCreateFlags = VSURFACE_CREATE_DEFAULT | VSURFACE_SYSTEM_MEM_USAGE;
00140             vs_desc.usWidth = 88;
00141             vs_desc.usHeight = 44;
00142             vs_desc.ubBitDepth = 8;
00143 
00144             if ( AddVideoSurface( &vs_desc, (UINT32 *)&gi8BitMiniMap ) == FALSE )
00145             {
00146                   return( ERROR_SCREEN );
00147             }
00148             GetVideoSurface( &ghvSurface, gi8BitMiniMap );
00149 
00150 
00151       }
00152 
00153       //OK, we are here, now loop through files
00154       if ( sCurFile == sFiles || FListNode== NULL )
00155       {
00156     gfProgramIsRunning = FALSE;
00157             return( MAPUTILITY_SCREEN );
00158       }
00159 
00160       sprintf( (char *)zFilename, "%s", FListNode->FileInfo.zFileName );
00161 
00162       // OK, load maps and do overhead shrinkage of them...
00163       if ( !LoadWorld( (UINT8 *)zFilename ) )
00164       {
00165             return( ERROR_SCREEN );
00166       }
00167 
00168       // Render small map
00169       InitNewOverheadDB( (UINT8)giCurrentTilesetID );
00170 
00171       gfOverheadMapDirty = TRUE;
00172 
00173       RenderOverheadMap( 0, (WORLD_COLS / 2), iOffsetHorizontal, 
00174             iOffsetVertical, 640 + iOffsetHorizontal, 320 + iOffsetVertical, FALSE );
00175 
00176   TrashOverheadMap( );
00177 
00178       // OK, NOW PROCESS OVERHEAD MAP ( SHOUIDL BE ON THE FRAMEBUFFER )
00179       gdXStep     = (float)640/(float)88;
00180       gdYStep     = (float)320/(float)44;
00181       dStartX = dStartY = 0;
00182 
00183       // Adjust if we are using a restricted map...
00184       if ( gMapInformation.ubRestrictedScrollID != 0 )
00185       {
00186             CalculateRestrictedMapCoords( NORTH, &sX1, &sY1, &sX2, &sTop, iOffsetHorizontal + 640, iOffsetVertical + 320 );
00187             CalculateRestrictedMapCoords( SOUTH, &sX1, &sBottom, &sX2, &sY2, iOffsetHorizontal + 640, iOffsetVertical + 320 );
00188             CalculateRestrictedMapCoords( WEST,  &sX1, &sY1, &sLeft, &sY2, iOffsetHorizontal + 640, iOffsetVertical + 320 );
00189             CalculateRestrictedMapCoords( EAST, &sRight, &sY1, &sX2, &sY2, iOffsetHorizontal + 640, iOffsetVertical + 320 );
00190 
00191             gdXStep     = (float)( sRight - sLeft )/(float)88;
00192             gdYStep     = (float)( sBottom - sTop )/(float)44;
00193 
00194             dStartX = sLeft;
00195             dStartY = sTop;
00196       }
00197 
00198       //LOCK BUFFERS
00199 
00200       dX = dStartX;
00201       dY = dStartY;
00202 
00203 
00204       pDestBuf = (UINT16*)LockVideoSurface(giMiniMap, &uiDestPitchBYTES);
00205       pSrcBuf = (UINT16*)LockVideoSurface(FRAME_BUFFER, &uiSrcPitchBYTES);
00206 
00207       for ( iX = 0; iX < 88; iX++ )
00208       {
00209             dY = dStartY;
00210 
00211             for ( iY = 0; iY < 44; iY++ )
00212             {
00213                   //OK, AVERAGE PIXELS
00214                   iSubX1 = (INT32)dX - WINDOW_SIZE;
00215 
00216                   iSubX2 = (INT32)dX + WINDOW_SIZE;
00217 
00218                   iSubY1 = (INT32)dY - WINDOW_SIZE;
00219 
00220                   iSubY2 = (INT32)dY + WINDOW_SIZE;
00221 
00222                   iCount = 0;
00223                   bR = bG = bB = 0;
00224 
00225                   for ( iWindowX = iSubX1; iWindowX < iSubX2; iWindowX++ )
00226                   {
00227                         for ( iWindowY = iSubY1; iWindowY < iSubY2; iWindowY++ )
00228                         {
00229                               if ( iWindowX >=0 && iWindowX < 640 && iWindowY >=0 && iWindowY < 320 )
00230                               {
00231                                     s16BPPSrc = pSrcBuf[ ( iWindowY * (uiSrcPitchBYTES/2) ) + iWindowX ];
00232 
00233                                     uiRGBColor = GetRGBColor( s16BPPSrc );
00234 
00235                                     bR += SGPGetRValue( uiRGBColor );
00236                                     bG += SGPGetGValue( uiRGBColor );
00237                                     bB += SGPGetBValue( uiRGBColor );
00238 
00239                                     // Average!
00240                                     iCount++;
00241                               }
00242                         }
00243 
00244                   }
00245 
00246                   if ( iCount > 0 )
00247                   {
00248                         bAvR = bR / (UINT8)iCount;
00249                         bAvG = bG / (UINT8)iCount;
00250                         bAvB = bB / (UINT8)iCount;
00251 
00252                         sDest16BPPColor = Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( bAvR, bAvG, bAvB ) );
00253                   }
00254 
00255                   //Write into dest!
00256                   pDestBuf[ ( iY * (uiDestPitchBYTES/2) ) + iX ] = sDest16BPPColor;
00257 
00258                   p24BitValues[ ( iY * (uiDestPitchBYTES/2) ) + iX ].r = (UINT8)bAvR;
00259                   p24BitValues[ ( iY * (uiDestPitchBYTES/2) ) + iX ].g = (UINT8)bAvG;
00260                   p24BitValues[ ( iY * (uiDestPitchBYTES/2) ) + iX ].b = (UINT8)bAvB;
00261 
00262                   //Increment
00263                   dY += gdYStep;
00264 
00265             }
00266 
00267             //Increment
00268             dX += gdXStep;
00269 
00270       }
00271 
00272       UnLockVideoSurface(giMiniMap);
00273       UnLockVideoSurface(FRAME_BUFFER);
00274 
00275       // RENDER!
00276       BltVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER, giMiniMap, 0, 20, 360, VS_BLT_FAST | VS_BLT_USECOLORKEY, NULL );
00277 
00278 
00279       //QUantize!
00280       pDataPtr = (UINT8*)LockVideoSurface(gi8BitMiniMap, &uiSrcPitchBYTES);
00281       pDestBuf = (UINT16*)LockVideoSurface(FRAME_BUFFER, &uiDestPitchBYTES);
00282       QuantizeImage( pDataPtr, p24BitDest, MINIMAP_X_SIZE, MINIMAP_Y_SIZE, pPalette );
00283       SetVideoSurfacePalette( ghvSurface, pPalette );
00284       // Blit!
00285       Blt8BPPDataTo16BPPBuffer( pDestBuf, uiDestPitchBYTES, ghvSurface, pDataPtr, 300, 360);
00286 
00287       // Write palette!
00288       {
00289             INT32 cnt;
00290             INT32 sX = 0, sY = 420;
00291             UINT16 usLineColor;
00292 
00293             SetClippingRegionAndImageWidth( uiDestPitchBYTES, 0, 0, 640, 480 );
00294             
00295             for ( cnt = 0; cnt < 256; cnt++ )
00296             {
00297                   usLineColor = Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( pPalette[ cnt ].peRed, pPalette[ cnt ].peGreen, pPalette[ cnt ].peBlue ) );
00298                   RectangleDraw( TRUE, sX, sY, sX, (INT16)( sY+10 ), usLineColor, (UINT8*)pDestBuf );
00299                   sX++;
00300                   RectangleDraw( TRUE, sX, sY, sX, (INT16)( sY+10 ), usLineColor, (UINT8*)pDestBuf );
00301                   sX++;
00302             }
00303       }
00304 
00305       UnLockVideoSurface(FRAME_BUFFER);
00306 
00307       // Remove extension
00308       for ( cnt = strlen( zFilename )-1; cnt >=0; cnt-- )
00309       {
00310             if ( zFilename[ cnt ] == '.' )
00311             {
00312                   zFilename[ cnt ] = '\0';
00313             }
00314       }
00315 
00316       sprintf( (char *)zFilename2, "RADARMAPS\\%s.STI", zFilename );
00317       WriteSTIFile( (INT8 *)pDataPtr, pPalette, MINIMAP_X_SIZE, MINIMAP_Y_SIZE, (STR) zFilename2, CONVERT_ETRLE_COMPRESS, 0 );
00318 
00319       UnLockVideoSurface(gi8BitMiniMap);
00320 
00321       SetFont( TINYFONT1 );
00322       SetFontBackground( FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK );
00323       SetFontForeground( FONT_MCOLOR_DKGRAY );                    
00324       mprintf( 10, 340, L"Writing radar image %S", zFilename2 );
00325 
00326       mprintf( 10, 350, L"Using tileset %s", gTilesets[ giCurrentTilesetID ].zName );
00327 
00328       InvalidateScreen( );
00329 
00330   while (DequeueEvent(&InputEvent) == TRUE)
00331   {
00332       if ((InputEvent.usEvent == KEY_DOWN)&&(InputEvent.usParam == ESC))
00333       { // Exit the program
00334         gfProgramIsRunning = FALSE;
00335       }
00336       }
00337 
00338       // Set next
00339       FListNode = FListNode->pNext;
00340       sCurFile++;
00341 
00342       return( MAPUTILITY_SCREEN );
00343 }
